=================================
The Problem: Every day we receive a lot of requests to join and most if not all of them is bots and this numbers has increased a lot to become around 60 new person every day. which take us time to go over one by one and see if we should add him or not (normally we check their profile).
The Question is: Should we make this group SECRET group?
PS: You can still invite your friends and the admins will also filter and approve.
story: Mohamed Alaa El Din created a poll in Egyptian Geeks.
